A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall disappointing for a Star Wars movie. Full of plotholes and inconsistencies with previous films. For example\, the Luke Skywalker character is totally out of line with Episodes 4-6. The seemingly all powerful villain Snoke is killed in such a ridiculously easy way. Rewatch previous Star Wars films (particularly Episodes 4-6) and you will realise how much Episode 8 is a lame shallow consumerist film.
